about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm a dedicated software engineer with a passion for building web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.

skills.title: Frontend Development
skills.description: Specialized in building modern, responsive user interfaces using Vue.js, React.js, and other frontend technologies.

skills.title: Full Stack Development
skills.description: Experienced in both frontend and backend technologies, including Node.js, Express, and various databases.

skills.title: UI/UX Focus
skills.description: Committed to creating intuitive, accessible, and visually appealing user interfaces with attention to detail.

bio: I'm a software engineer with over 5 years of experience in web development. My journey in technology started with a passion for creating intuitive user interfaces, and has evolved into expertise across the full development stack.
My professional experience includes working at Eminenture and Biz4Group, where I've contributed to various projects ranging from e-commerce platforms to enterprise applications.
When I'm not coding, I enjoy staying updated with the latest technology trends, contributing to open-source projects, and continuously improving my skills through learning and experimentation.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.subtitle: My technical toolkit and areas of expertise

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description: Leading development of complex web applications using React, Vue.js, and Node.js. Mentoring junior developers and implementing best practices for code quality.
achievements: Optimized application performance by 40% through code refactoring and implementing lazy loading
Led successful migration from legacy codebase to modern React architecture
Implemented automated testing that increased code coverage to 85%

positions.title: Web Developer
positions.description: Developed responsive web applications and collaborated with design team to create intuitive user interfaces.
achievements: Built and maintained multiple client websites with clean, efficient code
Implemented responsive designs across all projects ensuring optimal UX on all devices
Reduced page load times by 25% through performance optimizations
